page.title: 10Life Styles / The Dale Camp.
page.content: Most families in Saughall go on holiday once a year, and stay in a hotel.Most people wear comfortable clothes,enjoy music,and arcade games. Most people only use restaurants on special occasions. {DALE CAMP: This Army Camp at Moston houses 233 families of the 1st Kings Regiment and a new camp is due to open soon. Each regiment stays for about 4-5 years before moving abroad - Cyprus, Gibralter, Northern Ireland. Family life is different compared to locals - often fathers are away, relatives have to be visited due to limited time in England.
